      • setSplit

        public void setSplit(int split)
        The optimal split is usually going to be something akin to the number of workers * the mini batch size. Say if you have a system with 8 cores with 1 core per worker and a batch size of 10, you will want 80 as the batch size.
        Parameters:
        split -
